description.displayText:
Dear ,Prospective Family 

I am writing to highly recommend Nakiba B. for any nanny position that she may apply for. I had the pleasure of working with Nakiba for  2 years and during that time, she proved to be an exceptional caregiver and a valuable member of our household.

As a nanny, Nakiba was responsible for a wide range of duties, including meal preparation, light housekeeping, and most importantly, caring for our daughter B.; she was always punctual, reliable, and flexible with her schedule.

She was also highly organized, and her attention to detail was impeccable. She kept detailed records of our children's activities, meals, and milestones, which we greatly appreciated.

I was particularly impressed with Nakiba’s ability to communicate effectively with us as parents. She was always open and honest with her approach if any
issues that arose.She was always willing to go above and beyond even to insure the well being 
our dog and our household.

Overall, I have no doubt that Nakiba would make an exceptional nanny for any family she is highly qualified,experienced ,and passionate about childcare. I give her the highest recommendation without reservation.

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you require further information about Nakiba.

Sincerely,

Shianna E.
description.originalText:
Dear ,Prospective Family 

I am writing to highly recommend Nakiba B. for any nanny position that she may apply for. I had the pleasure of working with Nakiba for  2 years and during that time, she proved to be an exceptional caregiver and a valuable member of our household.

As a nanny, Nakiba was responsible for a wide range of duties, including meal preparation, light housekeeping, and most importantly, caring for our daughter B.; she was always punctual, reliable, and flexible with her schedule.

She was also highly organized, and her attention to detail was impeccable. She kept detailed records of our children's activities, meals, and milestones, which we greatly appreciated.

I was particularly impressed with Nakiba’s ability to communicate effectively with us as parents. She was always open and honest with her approach if any
issues that arose.She was always willing to go above and beyond even to insure the well being 
our dog and our household.

Overall, I have no doubt that Nakiba would make an exceptional nanny for any family she is highly qualified,experienced ,and passionate about childcare. I give her the highest recommendation without reservation.

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you require further information about Nakiba.

Sincerely,

Shianna E.

Nakiba tailored childcare for my family’s unique needs. We had two rambunctious little boys while Juggling the demands of a singing career. She was able to help manage the schedules of both my children and their afterschool activities. My job required a ton of traveling and Nakiba coordinated the parts of my children’s play time as well as their regular scheduled activities. To this day, I still laugh at how I would be all over the place trying to get the boys together and all she had to say was “Boys, are you simmering?” “Let’s simmer down guys.” And everyone just fell in line. We felt safe leaving for work and confident our children were well attended. I’m really grateful we had her. They had a lot of fun with her.
